MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Stirling, affecting properties in Wellside place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 07.09am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to an underground cable fault near Westbank clinic substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:19am on Friday, 30 October 2020.
